snippet: Mike Pelfrey was hoping to bounce back from his subpar 2011 season, but his first spring training start was disappointing.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Mike Pelfrey has rough outing in his spring training debut against Miami Marlins.
lead_paragraph: Mike Pelfrey was hoping to bounce back from his subpar 2011 season, but his first spring training start was disappointing.

headline.seo: Mike Pelfrey Hit Hard in Spring Training Debut
headline.main: Pelfrey Has Rough Outing in Spring Training Debut
headline.print_headline: Pelfrey Has Rough Outing in Spring Training Debut
